prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: The Super Rich Are Buying $100 Million Homes. For Some, One Isn't Enough.
Description: Since 2007, 20 homes have sold for once unthinkable nine-figure price tags, though many more have tried and failed.
No. I dont need to hear about the problems of the rich when I have money problems of my own.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Where did candy corn come from?
Description: Despite being a very popular Halloween candy, candy corn is one of the most divisive candies out there.
Yeah this would make me wonder and want to learn more.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: How millennials are changing banking
Description: How millennials changed banking
Im not a millenial and i dont care.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: How to Avoid Airbnb Scams and Find Legit Vacation Rentals Online
Description: Worried about getting scammed on your next vacation rental? Follow these tips to avoid the hassle and arrive with peace of mind.
I am starting to travel mroe so this woud be of interest to me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: The Curious Pasta Dish I Found on My Solo Trip to Italy
Description: Table for One is a column by Senior Editor Eric Kim, who loves traveling alone, and seeks to celebrate the beauty of solitude in its many forms.
I loved my trip to italy.  I would love to know more about their cuisine.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Katie Hill scandal underscores ongoing issue of 'revenge porn' with few solutions
Description: Hill resigned amid controversy over an alleged sexual relationship with one of her staffers and the release of nude photos. Her case highlights the lack of broad nonconsensual porn laws in the U.S.
Yes I am often fearful about revenge porn.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: The 9 most mind-blowing concept cars of the past decade
Description: With their futuristic designs, mind-blowing technology, and brilliant engineering, concept cars are one of the most exciting parts of the automotive industry. Fortunately, the 2010s featured a wide array of these dreamy vehicles that catered to every type of car lover out there. From luxury automakers like Mercedes-Benz, Audi, BMW, and Aston Martin came some of the most breathtaking concepts to ever hit the auto-show stages. Even Toyota debuted a sports car we can't believe will never reach production. Out of everything the 2010s brought us, though, we've narrowed it down to nine that we feel were the coolest concepts of the decade.
No.  I do not drive so no interest.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Are you in a relationship with a coworker? Read this
Description: Rules on workplace relationships are becoming increasingly common in the #MeToo era.
no i am not because i dont date my coworkers.

Title: This Is the Best Time of the Week to Buy a Car

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Pollution around the world: 30 shocking photos
Description: While it's easy to become overwhelmed by stats and images about current pollution and trajectories for years to come, the intent of this article is not to instill fear. The intent is to be realistic, to learn from what is going on in the world, and to support one another in our collective efforts to change. Pollution knows no boundaries, so for the sake of future generations, let's err on the side of action and hope.

Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
